project.name: Material Request System (نظام إدارة طلبات المواد)
project.description: A dashboard for construction procurement management involving Supervisors, Engineers, and Procurement Managers.

rtl_rules: Mirror all margins and paddings (ml -> mr, pl -> pr)
Sidebar must be on the RIGHT

buttons.primary: bg-orange-600 hover:bg-orange-700 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-sm shadow-sm transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 font-semibold py-3 px-6 rounded-sm

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm rounded-sm p-6 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
cards.dashboard_metric: flex flex-col justify-between h-full border-r-4 border-r-orange-500

inputs.style: flex h-12 w-full rounded-sm border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-orange-500 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 text-right

status_badges.pending: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-yellow-200 bg-yellow-50 px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold text-yellow-800
status_badges.approved: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-green-200 bg-green-50 px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold text-green-800
status_badges.rejected: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-red-200 bg-red-50 px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold text-red-800

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on the sidebar background to give it a 'concrete' feel if possible.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SET UP RTL: Add 'dir="rtl"' to the root html tag and 'lang="ar"'.
2. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Cairo font import to index.css immediately.
3. TAILWIND CONFIG: Extend the theme with the 'Construction Slate' and 'Safety Orange' colors.
4. SHADCN: When using Shadcn components, ensure they are wrapped in a DirectionProvider or manually adjusted for RTL (e.g., Chevrons in Select/Accordion might need rotation).
5. TRANSLATIONS: All UI text MUST be in Arabic. Use the provided terms: 'طلب مواد' (Material Request), 'مشرف' (Supervisor), 'مهندس' (Engineer), 'مدير مشتريات' (Procurement Manager).
6. DASHBOARD LAYOUT: Use a fixed right sidebar for navigation. Main content area on the left.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all inputs and buttons (e.g., 'login-email-input', 'submit-request-btn').
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic gradients. Use solid, high-contrast colors.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. 'p-8' is the new 'p-4'.
Every interaction needs a micro-animation (hover, focus, active).
Do not use 'Inter' for Arabic text. Use 'Cairo'.
Never use transparent backgrounds without blur.
